versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Formats decision matrices for display

schema.prompt:
Format the decision analysis results into a clear, visual matrix representation:

Score Results: {{input.scoreResults}}
Ranking Data: {{input.rankingData}}
Original Options Data: {{input.originalOptionsData}}
Display Preferences: {{input.displayPreferences}}

Create comprehensive matrix formatting:

1. Standard Decision Matrix:
   ```
   | Option      | Criterion 1 | Criterion 2 | ... | Total Score | Rank |
   |-------------|-------------|-------------|-----|-------------|------|
   | Option A    | 8 (0.4)     | 6 (0.18)    | ... | 7.2         | 1    |
   | Option B    | 6 (0.3)     | 9 (0.27)    | ... | 6.9         | 2    |
   ```
   - Show raw scores and weighted scores
   - Include totals and rankings
   - Color coding suggestions

2. Comparison Highlights:
   - Best score per criterion (bold/highlight)
   - Worst score per criterion (different color)
   - Close scores (within 10%)
   - Dominant options

3. Visual Elements:
   - Bar chart representation
   - Heat map coloring
   - Spider/radar chart data
   - Score distribution

4. Summary Statistics:
   - Winner and margin
   - Average scores
   - Score ranges
   - Consensus indicators

5. Detailed Breakdown:
   - Criterion-by-criterion analysis
   - Strengths/weaknesses per option
   - Trade-off visualization
   - Gap analysis

6. Alternative Views:
   - Simplified view (top 3 only)
   - Detailed view (all data)
   - Comparative view (pairwise)
   - Executive summary

7. Export Formats:
   - Plain text table
   - Markdown format
   - CSV structure
   - HTML table

Return as structured JSON with keys: formattedMatrix (string with formatted table), visualSummary (object with key insights), comparisonHighlights (array), detailedBreakdown (object by option), alternativeViews (object), exportFormats (object with different format strings), colorScheme (object).
